title: Import Merge Parameters
description: Options when data from one substance is merged into another

mergeReferences.comments: Copy references from new substance into existing substance
mergeReferences.title: Merge References

mergeNames.comments: Copy names from new substance into existing substance
mergeNames.title: Merge Names

mergeCodes.comments: Copy codes from new substance into existing substance
mergeCodes.title: Merge Codes

mergeProperties.comments: Copy properties from new substance into existing substance
mergeProperties.title: Merge Properties

mergeNotes.comments: Copy notes from new substance into existing substance
mergeNotes.title: Merge Notes

mergeNotesNoteUniqueness.comments: When merging notes, eliminate duplicates from the new items
mergeNotesNoteUniqueness.title: Note uniqueness

mergeRelationships.comments: Copy relationships from new substance into existing substance
mergeRelationships.title: Merge Relationships

mergeRelationshipsRelationshipUniqueness.comments: When merging relationship, eliminate duplicates from the new items
mergeRelationshipsRelationshipUniqueness.title: Relationship Uniqueness

mergeModifications.comments: Copy modifications from new substance into existing substance (see separate selections for Agent, Structural and Physical)
mergeModifications.title: Copy modifications from new substance into existing substance

mergeModificationsMergeStructuralModific.comments: When merging modifications, include structural modifications
mergeModificationsMergeStructuralModific.title: Merge Structural Modifications

mergeModificationsMergeAgentModification.comments: When merging modifications, include agent modifications
mergeModificationsMergeAgentModification.title: Merge Agent Modifications

mergeModificationsMergePhysicalModificat.comments: When merging modifications, include physical modifications
mergeModificationsMergePhysicalModificat.title: Merge Physical Modifications

skipLevelingReferences.comments: When merging codes, names, properties, etc., skip the step of copying references attached to these things
skipLevelingReferences.title: Skip Leveling References
